page.title: 02SECURITY LAMINATOR LTD
page.content: We went to Security Laminator Ltd, on the Leagate Industrial estate. We went in and they were unloadiing glass. These were carried by overhead cranes, they lifted the glass with suckers. The glass is measured to size. The glass was put in a big washing machiine. It went on through a room where they put a sheet of glass and then plastic a few times. Then they put it into a large electriic oven. After that they put it into a pressure chamber.Now t is bullet proof. They test it with various guns.
